# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented here. 

## [Unreleased]
- Coming up: Example savio scripts.
- 
## [v0.1.1-3] - 2026-02-20
- Tested example notebooks.
- Updated installation instructions.

## [0.1.0] - 2026-02-19
- Initial public release. Have not tested examples yet.
- Core: `TreblPipeline` and modules for mapping/refinement/error-correction (initial_map, map_refiner, error_correct, preprocess, finder, complexity, plotting, umi_deduplicate).
- Examples: Savio job scripts and a full-analysis notebook.
- Docs: Sphinx config (release 0.1.0).
- Project version set to `0.1.0` and licensed under MIT.
